intro.content: Cargo and passenger transportation services offer reliable and efficient solutions for moving goods and people from one location to another.

about.description1: Kolivan is a revolutionary platform that aims to connect vehicle owners with customers, making the process of finding cargo or passenger transportation simple and efficient. Our cutting-edge technology utilizes AI models to offer optimal transportation solutions.
about.description2: Finding the right transportation service can often be a daunting and time-consuming task. Whether you need to transport goods or passengers, the process typically involves numerous phone calls, negotiations, and logistical challenges. Kolivan streamlines this process by providing a user-friendly platform where customers can easily find the transportation they need.

service1.description: Trucking service delivers your cargo safely from one point to another using trucks and other vehicles

service2.description: Our passenger transportation service provides comfortable and efficient travel options for individuals and groups

service3.description: This service allows you to register as a driver, accept and process the orders here that are suitable for you

whyus.description: You can choose us based on the following features. We are always at your service. You are in the right place for reliable and quality service.

feature1.description: This feature is easier than calling. This way you can contact us with one click

feature2.description: You just tell us what you want and we solve your problem instantly.

feature3.description: There is a driver rating system for customers. Through this feature, you can choose the most ideal driver for yourself.

feature4.description: We always think of our customers and do our best for their happiness.

step1.paragraph: Select a category and submit a request

step2.paragraph: As the driver, you will see the requests from the customer

step3.paragraph: Drivers and customers will follow the journey in real time

info.title: For more information call us
info.description: You can contact us for more information. All your questions will be answered promptly.

question1.title: What is Kolivan?
question1.content: Kolivan offers a simplified and efficient process for finding cargo and passenger transportation service is a revolutionary platform that connects car owners with customers.

question2.title: Is Kolivan available for both cargo and passenger transportation?
question2.content: Yes, Kolivan meets the needs of both cargo and passenger transportation, offering an optimal solution for various transportation requirements.

question3.title: What are the benefits of using Kolivan?
question3.content: By using Kolivan, customers can easily find transportation services without the need for multiple phone calls and negotiations. Also, car owners can maximize their earning potential by tapping into a large customer base.

question4.title: How does Kolivan work?
question4.content: Kolivan uses advanced AI models to analyze various factors such as location, cargo/passenger type and available vehicles. It offers the most suitable transport solutions to customer requirements.

contact.description: Contact us, we will get back to you soon.
contact.name: Name
contact.succesDescription: Your message has been sent successfully. We will contact you as soon as possible.
contact.errorDescription: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.

footer.trustedPartner: Your Trusted Partner in Transportation Services
